alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Bremerton and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area; San Juan County; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 1:57AM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. Inundation of around two feet above ground level is possible along shorelines and low- lying coastal areas, which corresponds to minor flood level. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Everett and Vicinity, Tacoma Area, Admiralty Inlet Area, Hood Canal Area, Seattle and Vicinity and Bremerton and Vicinity zones. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 10 AM PST today. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding due to tidal overflow is expected around high tide. This may lead to flooding of parking lots, parks, and roads, with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inundation above ground level refers to the height above the Mean Higher High Water (MHHW) level.
